body: I understand this is a helper function, so the naming/docs are not as important (i.e., "read the source code if you actually want to know what it does"). However, for future reference when writing docstrings, I'd recommend adding: (1) the precise types of all the arguments (e.g., flat is a tuple of (list of dense tensor, list of dense tensor)) and tensor is a list of sparse tensors; (2) the type returned (list of sparse tensors).
